title: Demonspawn blood saint
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all demonspawn, see [list of demonspawn](/List_of_demonspawn "List of demonspawn").*

| demonspawn blood saint 6 [![Demonspawn blood saint.png](/images/7/72/Demonspawn_blood_saint.png)](/File:Demonspawn_blood_saint.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                |

| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A half-mortal, half-demonic creature, radiating an intense heat. It weaves powerful and unpredictable spells of devastation. |

## Useful Info

**Demonspawn blood saints** are demonspawn who can cast semi-random conjurations and empower nearby allies. They can be found in the [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                                              |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Legendary Destruction](/Legendary_Destruction "Legendary Destruction") (3d19 / 3d21 / 3d25) | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Call of Chaos](/Call_of_Chaos "Call of Chaos")                                              | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), demonspawns with the blood saint class could have any base (monstrous, gelid, infernal, or torturous), instead of all of them being infernal.
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), blood saint's [Legendary Destruction](/Legendary_Destruction "Legendary Destruction") had six possible magical effects: [Orb of Electrocution](/Orb_of_Electrocution "Orb of Electrocution"), [Lehudib's Crystal Spear](/Lehudib%27s_Crystal_Spear "Lehudib's Crystal Spear"), [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction"), [Ghostly Fireball](/Ghostly_Fireball "Ghostly Fireball"), [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), and [Flash Freeze](/Flash_Freeze "Flash Freeze"). The caster randomly conjured only one of those effects at a time instead of two.
- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), blood saints got [Call of Chaos](/Call_of_Chaos "Call of Chaos").
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), they could temporally heal themselves and nearby allies with [Ephemeral Infusion](/Ephemeral_Infusion "Ephemeral Infusion"). Also, each casting of [Legendary Destruction](/Legendary_Destruction "Legendary Destruction") injured them for 10 HP.
- Blood saints were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
Demonspawn blood saint

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all demonspawn, see list of demonspawn.

demonspawn blood saint 6 
HP 61-124
HD 15
XP 1108
Speed 10
AC 6
EV 12
Will 60
Attack1 20 (hit: fire)


Resistances rF+++
rTorm
rMiasma
Vulnerabilities Holy
Silver
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type demonspawn, demonspawn
Flags Evil

Speaks
Warm-blooded
A half-mortal, half-demonic creature, radiating an intense heat. It weaves powerful and unpredictable spells of devastation.

Useful Info

Demonspawn blood saints are demonspawn who can cast semi-random conjurations and empower nearby allies. They can be found in the Pandemonium.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Legendary Destruction (3d19 / 3d21 / 3d25) Priest flag
Slot2 Call of Chaos Priest flag

History

  • Prior to 0.28, demonspawns with the blood saint class could have any base (monstrous, gelid, infernal, or torturous), instead of all of them being infernal.
  • Prior to 0.19, blood saint's Legendary Destruction had six possible magical effects: Orb of Electrocution, Lehudib's Crystal Spear, Orb of Destruction, Ghostly Fireball, Fireball, and Flash Freeze. The caster randomly conjured only one of those effects at a time instead of two.
  • In 0.19, blood saints got Call of Chaos.
  • Prior to 0.17, they could temporally heal themselves and nearby allies with Ephemeral Infusion. Also, each casting of Legendary Destruction injured them for 10 HP.
  • Blood saints were added in 0.14.
